title: Personal Videoconferencing
text: The first book on the most powerful communication tool since the development of the personal computer, Personal Videoconferencing will help you streamline your business and gain a competitive edge. It summarizes the experience of more than seventy companies in many industries in the use of desktop and laptop videoconferencing to collaborate on documents and applications while communicating through video, face-to-face. Anyone who shares information with others will benefit from reading this book.
